long_description: Part of the Jambu Barefoot collection, the Spin shoes are designed to emulate your natural walking motion for complete comfort for your adventures around town and to the beach. Water-ready insole material allows for quick, odor-resistant drying. Memory foam footbeds conform to the unique contours of your feet. Ultralight mesh uppers offer exceptional breathability and comfort. Outsoles combine natural nonmarking rubber and rice/husk components for excellent traction and durability. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Part of the Jambu Barefoot collection, the Spin shoes are designed to emulate your natural walking motion for complete comfort for your adventures around town and to the beach.
